code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'@reach/router';import ArticleVoteButton from'./ArticleVoteButton';import'../App.css';var ArticleCard=function ArticleCard(props){var articleArray=[];if(props.article_id){articleArray=[props.articles_list];return articleArray.map(function(article){var date=new Date(article.created_at);return React.createElement("ul",{key:article.article_id},React.createElement("li",{id:"article_card"},React.createElement("h2",null,article.title),React.createElement("br",null),React.createElement("p",null,"Author: ",article.author),React.createElement("br",null),React.createElement("p",null,"Posted: ",date.toString()),React.createElement("br",null),React.createElement("p",null,article.body),React.createElement(ArticleVoteButton,{votes:props.votes,article_id:props.article_id})));});}else{articleArray=props.articles_list;return articleArray.map(function(article){var date=new Date(article.created_at);return React.createElement(Link,{id:"article_card_home",to:"/".concat(article.article_id)},React.createElement("label",{key:article.article_id},React.createElement("li",{id:"home_article_card"},React.createElement("span",{id:"article_heading"},article.title),React.createElement("br",null),React.createElement("br",null),"Posted:",date.toString()," Comments: ",article.comment_count," Votes:",article.votes),React.createElement("br",null)));});}};export default ArticleCard;
